summary: This document is an email exchange between Jeffrey Epstein and Jes Staley discussing whether Staley is still in the Hamptons. The email contains a confidentiality notice indicating that the information may be attorney-client privileged.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is mentioned as the recipient of an email from Jeffrey Epstein, inquiring about his whereabouts.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, asking Jes Staley if he is still in the Hamptons.

connections.description: Jes Staley and Jeffrey Epstein are communicating in a casual manner, indicating a social relationship.

keyFacts: The email exchange took place on December 5, 2010.
Jeffrey Epstein inquired about Jes Staley's location, specifically if he was still in the Hamptons.
The email contains a confidentiality notice suggesting it may be attorney-client privileged.
The communication is marked as confidential and unauthorized use is prohibited.
